head.title: Paid Notice: Memorials LABRECQUE, THOMAS G.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Memorials LABRECQUE, THOMAS G.

block.p: LABRECQUE-Thomas G. A Memorial Service will be held at St. Patrick's Cathedral, New York, N.Y., on November 8 at 10:00 A.M. A private funeral service for the family and friends will be held at Holy Cross Church, Rumson, NJ on October 19 at 10:00 A.M. In lieu of flowers, the family requests that memorials be sent to: the Thomas G. Labrecque Leadership Institute of Red Bank Catholic High School, 112 Broad St, Red Bank, NJ 07701 or Memorial SloanKettering Cancer Center - Lung Cancer Research Fund, Box E, 1275 York Avenue, New York, New York 10021.
